name: Undead Eatery (itch) (kevinkessels1998)
description:
Welcome to Undead Eatery, a game where you get to run a zombie restaurant. The main focus for you in Undead Eatery is to cook and serve normal people all kinds of food. As you do that, you will get to accumulate money. When you have enough money you will be able to create a special type of food. But until you get to that point you will have to run a legit restaurant business with its pros and cons.
The primary focus here is to try and be the richest players as you send your zombies to them and steal their money. The game is very immersive, full of challenges and it offers you a very creative and distinctive set of ideas. If you are very passionate about the idea of running a business, then trying to use your power to eliminate all competition, check out Undead Eatery right now!
Features:
• Run a legit business,
• Unique concept, amazing game mechanics
• Easy to play, hard to master!
